creator: bhabanisankar071188@gmail.com
text: While recording for salesforce application jmeter is not checking encode parameters for some parameters like viewstates, echoScontrol, echoScontrolMac. That is why jmeter is sending with extra characters when replying with extracted parameters and server is responding with error. The parameters would be going with encode parameters checked for some requests and for some without.

Bugzilla is not a support forum.
Please use user mailing list for such questions.
Regards
creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
